await owner.sendTransaction({to: contractAddress, value: ethers.utils.parseEther("10")});
const contractAddress = "YOUR_CONTRACT_ADDRESS_FROM_DEPLOYMENT";
const [owner] = await ethers.getSigners();

npm rundev
await owner.sendTransaction({to: contract.address, value: ethers.utils.parseEther("10")});
const contract = await ethers.getContractAt("HackathonRegistry", "CONTRACT_ADDRESS_HERE");
const [owner] = await ethers.getSigners();
